content: crochet this adorable owl keychain with the free diy fluffies pattern the pattern is available for free in english and dutch including full free video when you make the owl with cotton sport weight yarn the size will be 5 cm/ 2 inch made with super bulky chenille yarn the size is 11 cm / 4 inch you can make the cute owl amigurumi bigger by using thicker yarn and a larger crochet hook english video https //youtu be/7eney3prhi0 dutch video soon english pattern https //www mariskavos nl/free-owl-crochet-pattern/ dutch pattern https //www mariskavos nl/nl/gratis-uil-amigurumi-knuffel-haken/
